Record.ClassificationPath: Parasitic Diseases/Helminthiasis/Nematode Infections/Secernentea Infections/Strongylida Infections/Hookworm Infections
Record.Description: Infection of humans or animals with hookworms other than those caused by the genus Ancylostoma or Necator, for which the specific terms ANCYLOSTOMIASIS and NECATORIASIS are available.
